text: Kill the Moonlight is a 2002 album by the rock band Spoon. Kill the Moonlight may also refer to: *Kill the Moonlight (film), a 1992 American independent film by Steve Hanft *Let's Kill the Moonlight! (also called Let's Murder the Moonlight!; original title Uccidiamo il Chiaro di Luna!), a 1909 Futurist manifesto by Italian poet Filippo Tommaso Marinetti
title: Kill the Moonlight (disambiguation)
